comment: Apply the scalar sigma function (involution) ` G ` to an inner product reverses the arguments. The inner product of ` X ` and ` Y ` is represented by ` ( ( S `` Y ) `` X ) ` . Line 15 in [Baer] p. 111, f(x,y) alpha = f(y,x). (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2015.)
